knimeNode.name: PNN Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies unknown data to a Probabilistic Neural Network (PNN).

fullDescription.intro: Applies unknown data to a Probabilistic Neural Network (PNN). The first input port contains the test data, the second one contains the PNN Model to which the data are applied. The output data has one additional column with the predicted class attribute.
fullDescription.option: The name of the predicted column, appended to the test data.

A probability between 0.0 and 1.0. Instances whose activation lies above this theshold are classified with an unknown missing class. This is useful in cases where the feature space is not completely covered by rules.

ports.dataIn: Test data must have same column names and types as the PNN model.
ports.dataOut: Test data with one additional column.
ports.predParamIn: PNN model used to classify test data.
